entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind west 20 km/h becoming north 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High 8. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Saturday 6 May 2023
